page.title: 14Culcreuch Castle: FINTRY
page.content:
{So titled by the previous owner,} the castle is now a centre for a Tourism. Its history, setting and the hospitality of the Proprietor and Staff make it popular.
{Catering}is for banquets, conferences, weddings, shooting and fishing. There is accommodation for families in adjacent{luxury chalets.}The woods and river walks are enjoyed by locals and visitors alike and the{spring-time {show of daffodils}is an attraction.
The farm ground is let locally. The staffing at the castle, which is still a family home, helps local employment. { {Entertainment}is always suited to the occasion and can vary from a lone piper to a ceilidh band.
